libICEpost.src.base.Filter

@author: <N. Surname> <e-mail> Last update: DD/MM/YYYY

Fliters for data pre-processing

Content of the package:
Filter (class)

Base class

Resample (class)

Resampling with constant discretization

Low-pass filter
